analysis.description:
BNB (/unique_contracts/0x3c9e54bc523f04b424de9134df4cc0301bdecdbb.sol#38-140) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_contracts/0x3c9e54bc523f04b424de9134df4cc0301bdecdbb.sol#78-88)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x3c9e54bc523f04b424de9134df4cc0301bdecdbb.sol:
	Contract BNB has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x3c9e54bc523f04b424de9134df4cc0301bdecdbb.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_contracts/0x3c9e54bc523f04b424de9134df4cc0301bdecdbb.sol#31-38) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
